summary: The module implements a linear multistep scheduler tailored for discrete diffusion models. It creates beta schedules, converts them to sigma representations, manages timesteps, scales inputs, and performs LMS-based state updates to generate samples during the diffusion sampling process.
business_intent: Provide a robust and efficient scheduling component that drives the sampling loop of diffusion-based generative models, enabling faster and higher-quality image generation by accurately predicting denoised samples across timesteps.
